newsitem.title: TAIWAN: Taiwan central bank to inject funds on Wednesday.
newsitem.headline: Taiwan central bank to inject funds on Wednesday.

text.p: Taiwan's central bank said on Wednesday it would inject funds into the banking system later in the day through open market operations.

The bank, through three bills finance companies, would execute within-30-day open market operations on qualified securities instruments offered by interested financial institutions, a bank official said.
Bids would close at 1100 a.m (0300 GMT).
The funds would be released according to actual demand, he said.
